description: 2 images on one sheet; Scene 1 illustrates a couple at left looking at suits hanging on a low rack; back of man wearing a trenchcoat and holding a folded umbrella at right; another figure in back, center; Scene 2 illustrates the couple at right, with the woman leaning against a store fixture and the man putting on a suit jacket, assisted by another man; 2 other men in back at left
marks: Signature, Date and Edition LRC below image, in pencil: [Andrew Raftery 2002]
title: Scenes 1 and 2, from Suit Shopping:  An Engraved Narrative
